targets.expr: sum(nginx_http_connections{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", state="active"})
sum(rate(nginx_http_status{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*"}[5m]))

panels.description: The ratio of 4XX and 5XX requests per second on the current ALB over the last 5 minutes

targets.expr: sum(rate(nginx_http_status{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", status=~"[4-5].*"}[5m]))/(sum(irate(nginx_http_status{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*"}[5m])) + 0.01)

panels.title: Error Rate

panels.description: The average latency of requests on the current ALB over the last 5 minutes

targets.expr: sum(increase(nginx_http_request_duration_seconds_sum{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*"}[5m]))/sum(increase(nginx_http_request_duration_seconds_count{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*"}[5m]))

panels.title: Latency

panels.description: The CPU usage of the current ALB

targets.expr: sum by(pod_name) (container_cpu_usage_seconds_total_irate5m{pod_name=~"$name-.*", image="", namespace=~"$namespace", vmcluster="$vmcluster"})

panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: The memory usage of the current ALB

targets.expr: sum by(pod_name) (container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod_name=~"$name-.*", image="", namespace=~"$namespace", vmcluster="$vmcluster"})

panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: The network IO throughput of the current ALB

targets.expr: sum by(pod_name) (container_network_receive_bytes_total_irate5m{pod_name=~"$name-.*", namespace=~"$namespace", vmcluster="$vmcluster"})
sum by(pod_name) (container_network_transmit_bytes_total_irate5m{pod_name=~"$name-.*", namespace=~"$namespace", vmcluster="$vmcluster"})

panels.title: Network Receive/Transmit

panels.description: Current disk IO throughput of the ALB

targets.expr: sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{vmcluster="$vmcluster",namespace=~"$namespace",pod=~"$name-.*",container!=""}[5m]))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{vmcluster="$vmcluster",namespace=~"$namespace",pod=~"$name-.*",container!=""}[5m]))

panels.title: Disk Read/Write Rate

panels.description: The current ingress (qps,request throughput,response throughtput,error ratio, latency of p50,latency of p50 from upstream,latency of p90,latency of p90 from upstream,latency of p99,latency of p99 from upstream ) on the ALB for the last 5 minutes

targets.expr: sum by(source_namespace, source_name) (rate(nginx_http_status{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="ingress"}[5m]))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(nginx_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="ingress"}[5m])) by (le, source_namespace, source_name))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(nginx_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="ingress"}[5m])) by (le, source_namespace, source_name))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(nginx_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="ingress"}[5m])) by (le, source_namespace, source_name))

(sum(rate(nginx_http_status{vmcluster="$vmcluster", status=~"[4-5].*", source_type="ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*"}[5m])) by (source_namespace, source_name) + 0 )/ (sum(rate(nginx_http_status{vmcluster="$vmcluster", source_type="ingress", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*"}[5m])) by (source_namespace, source_name) + 0.01)

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(nginx_http_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="ingress"}[5m])) by (le, source_namespace, source_name))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(nginx_http_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="ingress"}[5m])) by (le, source_namespace, source_name))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(nginx_http_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="ingress"}[5m])) by (le, source_namespace, source_name))
sum(rate(nginx_http_request_size_bytes{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="ingress"}[5m])) by (source_namespace,source_name)
sum(rate(nginx_http_response_size_bytes{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="ingress"}[5m])) by (source_namespace,source_name)

panels.title: Ingress Status

panels.description: The current HTTPRoute (qps,request throughput,response throughtput,error ratio, latency of p50,latency of p50 from upstream,latency of p90,latency of p90 from upstream,latency of p99,latency of p99 from upstream ) on the ALB for the last 5 minutes

targets.expr: sum by(source_namespace, source_name) (rate(nginx_http_status{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="httpRoute"}[5m]))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(nginx_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="httpRoute"}[5m])) by (le, source_namespace, source_name))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(nginx_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="httpRoute"}[5m])) by (le, source_namespace, source_name))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(nginx_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="httpRoute"}[5m])) by (le, source_namespace, source_name))

(sum(rate(nginx_http_status{vmcluster="$vmcluster", status=~"[4-5].*", source_type="httpRoute", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*"}[5m])) by (source_namespace, source_name) + 0 )/ (sum(rate(nginx_http_status{vmcluster="$vmcluster", source_type="httpRoute", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*"}[5m])) by (source_namespace, source_name) + 0.01)

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(nginx_http_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="httpRoute"}[5m])) by (le, source_namespace, source_name))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(nginx_http_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="httpRoute"}[5m])) by (le, source_namespace, source_name))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(nginx_http_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="httpRoute"}[5m])) by (le, source_namespace, source_name))
sum(rate(nginx_http_request_size_bytes{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="httpRoute"}[5m])) by (source_namespace,source_name)
sum(rate(nginx_http_response_size_bytes{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="httpRoute"}[5m])) by (source_namespace,source_name)

panels.title: HTTPRoute Status

panels.description: The current non ingress or httproute (qps,request throughput,response throughtput,error ratio, latency of p50,latency of p50 from upstream,latency of p90,latency of p90 from upstream,latency of p99,latency of p99 from upstream ) on the ALB for the last 5 minutes

targets.expr: sum by(namespace, rule) (rate(nginx_http_status{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="", rule!=""}[5m]))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(nginx_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="", rule!=""}[5m])) by (le, namespace, rule))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(nginx_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="", rule!=""}[5m])) by (le, namespace, rule))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(nginx_http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="", rule!=""}[5m])) by (le, namespace, rule))

(sum(rate(nginx_http_status{vmcluster="$vmcluster", status=~"[4-5].*", source_type="", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", rule!=""}[5m])) by (namespace, rule) + 0 )/ (sum(rate(nginx_http_status{vmcluster="$vmcluster", source_type="", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", rule!=""}[5m])) by (namespace, rule) + 0.01)

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(nginx_http_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="", rule!=""}[5m])) by (le, namespace, rule))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(nginx_http_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="", rule!=""}[5m])) by (le, namespace, rule))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(nginx_http_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="", rule!=""}[5m])) by (le, namespace, rule))
sum(rate(nginx_http_request_size_bytes{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="", rule!=""}[5m])) by (namespace,rule)
sum(rate(nginx_http_response_size_bytes{vmcluster="$vmcluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$name-.*", source_type="", rule!=""}[5m])) by (namespace,rule)

panels.title: Rule Status
